mapper.select: select * from project as proj inner join company as comp left join villes as v on comp.ville_id = v.id

select * from project as proj, project_contact as prj_contact , company_contact as cmp_contact, company_entity as entity where prj_contact.project_id = proj.id and prj_contact.contact_id = cmp_contact.id and cmp_contact.entity_id = entity.id and entity.id = #{entity.id};
select * from company as comp left join villes as v on comp.ville_id = v.id
select * from company_entity as comp_entity , company as comp left join villes as v on comp.ville_id = v.id where comp_entity.company_id = comp.id and comp_entity.company_id = #{company.id}
